1.0.name: wordpress/google-translate-for-sociable
1.0.description:
Allow your readers to post your article to Google Translate. WordPress 2.6 or above and Sociable 3.4.1 or above is required, if you use an older version of those, please upgrade.

More info:

  • More info on Sociable, with info on how to add sites to it, and how to integrate it into your WordPress in other ways.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author.
